DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - To define The difference bio-chemical phenotype chronic airway inflammatory disease . - To identify novel biomarkers chronic airway inflammatory disease screen , diagnostic , monitor marker .
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old Both sex Asthma COPD diagnose accord criterion American Thoracic Society , GINA , GOLD guideline Acute exacerbation define criterion American Thoracic Society , GINA , GOLD guideline For stable disease , none subject receive inhaled oral corticosteroid antiinflammatory drug , exacerbation history previous 6 month
